comments:
I have a workspace with many plugin projects say project1... project10
In my java perspective
I also have plugin.xml editor open for project1 project2 & project3.

Along with that I also have some java source files open in their editors.

I closed eclipse and brought it back up.
I verified that all previous editors are open.

Now I expand project4 in java package explorer and double click on its 
plugin.xml
instead of opening the file, all other editor instances of plugin.xml files in 
project1 project2 etc start flashing. Ultimately it doesnt open plugin.xml for 
project4.

anything in the log?
waht happens when you do 'open with > text editor'?
what when you do 'open with > plugin manifest editor'?

There is nothing in the .log file but if I leave consolelog on, I get the

I have seen this elsewhere. Looks like a problem loading resource bundle

That code has substantially changed in 2.1
Closing...
